title: Updates
content: Why does Firefox update so often. I lose all of my trust settings every time it updates and it is really beginning to irritate me. I have to reset everything. If this cannot be sorted out I will move to another browser that doesn't make me waste so much time resetting everything on a weekly basis
creator: ian101

title: Your Directions for adding apps and other items does not match my version of Firefox
content: I have reloaded Mozilla Firefox again and now I'm totally confused. I had to do something, because your instructions on for instance Bookmarks suggest I click on the Toolbar button, but my version has not got one. Also I had to Download something called Filelink so I could send a Video by Email. Accept I can't find the link called "Preferences" that is in your instructions to make it work. Is your instruction schematics up to date or do I have to download another version or do I have to personalize my Website.
creator: gregaryus

title: unable to add / assign search shortcuts / keywords (interface seem to be disabled)
content:
Hi all,

Using: Firefox 119.0.1 (64-bit) on Windows 10.

I seem to having an issue with adding search shortcuts on FF, I am following this guide:

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/assign-shortcuts-search-engines

But I'm stuck at step #4 as the table seems to be disabled.

This is a personal laptop and has not policies on it.

Thanks for your time and assistance!
creator: atanation

title: login to twitch.tv
content: Hello. I am finding on different devices i have that firefox won't let me do things i could do before. Example. On my cellphone. I can't login to twitch.tv nor can i get into my yahoo mail account. It says i have an unsupported browser and i didn't have that problem before. The twitch problem is the same on my pc. I can't login. The login and my credentials are there but the button won't let me log in. Please help me. Thanks. Susan
creator: nataliescottl

title: websites connection failure
content:
Hi Firefox Team, I am a university student, and I keep getting these messages below, especially when I am doing research for my assignments; it is painful as time is of the essence. I need your help asap. I have already cleared my cache, and cookies Thank you The connection was reset

The connection to the server was reset while the page was loading. 

   The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments.    If you are unable to load any pages, check your computerâ€™s network connection.    If a firewall or proxy protects your computer or network, make sure that Firefox is permitted to access the web.

title: Netflix wont play?
content: Hi y'all! I've been trying to get netflix to play recently, and I keep getting the error code F7351. I tried looking it up, and didn't get anything, and also tried to dis- and re- enable DRM content, and that didn't work. Does anyone know what to do? Thanks for any help!!
